title: ore trees MOD里的矿石树怎么制作呀？
author: chenye7770

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
只要把黃金樹種種在鐵磚上便可種出煤礦，有低機率生成鑽石，種在黃金磚上可種出鐵礦，種在鑽石磚上種出金礦，種在苔石上長出苔石。
石頭樹種跟黃金樹種類似，但它長出來的不是樹葉而是碎石（鵝卵石）
礦石生長魔杖可加速樹苗生長，效果同於骨粉

原帖說明:

Plant the Golden Sapling and wait for it to grow. It needs the same amount of light and space as the normal tree. If you plant it on an iron block, it grows coal. If you plant it on a gold block, it grows iron. If you plant it on a diamond block, it grows gold. If you plant it on a mossy cobblestone block, it grows mossy cobblestone. The Stone Sapling is the same as the Golden Sapling, but it makes cobblestone instead of leaves. The Ore Growth Wand can be used to grow Ore Trees instantly, like bonemeal. 

Golden Sapling　黃金樹苗：
　　[gold_ingot]
[gold_ingot][gold_ingot]
　　[gold_ingot]

Stone Sapling　石頭樹苗：
[cubblestone][gold_ingot][cubblestone]
[gold_ingot][gold_ingot]
[cubblestone][gold_ingot][cubblestone]

Ore Growth Wand　礦石生長魔杖：
[bone_meal][gold_ingot][bone_meal]
　　[gold_ingot]
　　[gold_ingot]
